title: Advice to Balam's ass, or, Momus catechised in answer to a certaine scurrilous and abusive scribler, one John Heydon, author of Advice to a daughter / by T.P., Gent.
author: Pecke, Thomas, b. 1637.
publisher: Printed by E.B. for Henry Marsh ...,
notes: A defence of Francis Osborne's Advice to a son.
